title: Thresh
body: i have idea for {{champion:412}}  it is about his lantern / when you put the lantern maybe he will not see it so why i can't caught him with myself . **i don't know but i like that and i hope you like it**

replies.body: If i get your idea right ist Kind of a Kalista ult, pulling People back to you with it at your will? Sry but that would open too much possibilities for trolls. Kata out of her ult and such stuff. if i get it wrong, sry.
